name: Structured Programming
details: Learn the basics of structured programming with the language C. Learn the basic fundamentals like variables, conditionals, mathematical operations, loops, structures, functions etc.

name: Discrete Mathematics
details: Learn the mathematics required to build up the logics behind programming, also Learn graphs and trees.

name: Data Structure
details: Learn the structures of data when stored and efficient methods of storing them. Learn Arrays, Stack, Queue, Linked Lists, Graphs, Trees, Linear Search, Binary Search, Bubble Sort, Insertion sort, Selection sort, Radix sort etc

name: Object Oriented Programming
details: Learn the basics of object oriented programming with the language JAVA. Learn the basic fundamentals like variables, conditionals, mathematical operations, loops, structures, functions etc. Also learn object oriented programming fundamentals like classes, objects, inheritence, polymorphism etc.

name: Digital Logic Design
details: Learn how to design certain circuits using ICs and logic gates. Learn how to minimize and make a circuit efficiently.

name: Algorithms
details: Learn how to create basic steps to solve a programming problem. Also learn to make the programs run faster and consume less storage. Learn the concepts of Time and Space Complexity.

name: Classical Mechanics
details: Learn how everything in our world moves. Learn about the forces that works behind movement of every object around us. Learn about Newton's Law, Projectiles, motion, circular motion etc.

name: Electricity and Electronics
details: Learn about the fundamentals of a famous power which is widely used in our society, Electricity. Learn how it works and how we can properly use it to build devices to make our life more convenient. Learn about Laws of electricity, circuits, Ohm's Law, KCL, KVL, Semi conductors etc

name: Fluid Mechanics
details: Learn how fluids move and work. Learn about the mechanics of Gas, Liquid, Statics and Dynamics. Also Learn about Compressibility, Density, Viscosity, Surface Tension etc.

name: Introduction to Astronomy
details: Learn about the most amazing side of the Physics and about this universe. Learn how this universe and celestial objects work. Learn about Planets, Stars, Nebula, Galaxy, Gravity, Black Hole, Giant Stars, Neutron Stars, Relativity etc

name: Periodic Table and Chemical Reaction
details: Learn what makes up every object in our life. Learn about 118 Unique elements that make up everything in our universe. Learn about atoms, proton, neutron, electron, periodic features, chemical reactions, different types of reactions etc

name: Organic Chemistry
details: Learn what makes up organic bodies in our universe. Learn about Alkene, Alkane, Alkyne, Alcohol, Ester,how to name organic molecules, Organic Reactions, HydroCarbon Molecules etc.

name: Electro Chemistry
details: Learn about the chemistry behind batteries and electricity. Learn about Galvanic Cell, Anode Reaction, Cathode Reaction, Salt Bridge, Dry Cell, Redox Reactions, Rechargeable Cells etc

name: Calculus
details: Learn about the most famous topic of Math of all time. Learn how Calculus helps us to calculate any function with just slight change. Learn about Differentiation, Limits, Partial Differentiations, Differential equations, Partial Differential Equations, Integration, Integrals, Definite and Indefinite Integrals, UV(LIATE) law for integrals etc.

name: Probability and Statistics
details: Learn about the most important tool for science, statistics. Also Learn about Probability. Learn about Mean, Median, Average, Different types of Average, Standard Deviation, Mean Deviation, Probability, Probability Tree, conditional probability, dependent probability etc

name: Trigonometry
details: Learn about the magics of right triangles. Learn how the angles are related to each other and how to calculate the angles with just the sides. Learn about basic trigonometry, conversions, inverse trigonometry, Application of Trigonometry, Trigonometric Functions, Quadrants etc

name: Introduction to Electrical Engineering
details: Learn about the basics of electricity and how it works. Learn about potentials, potential difference, potential point, current flow, resistance, charge etc

name: Electrical Circuits
details: Learn how to build up a circuit efficiently. Learn about Series Circuits, Parallel Circuits, How to use Breadboards, Resistors, Ammeter , VoltMeter, Capacitors etc

name: HTML5 and CSS3
details: Start learning the basics of Web Development with HTML and CSS. Learn HTML tags, Paragraph, Heading, Images, Links, Tables, Semantic Tags, Styles, Media Queries, CSS Animation etc

name: CSS frameworks Bootstrap and Tailwind
details: Dive Deeper with CSS as you learn 2 of it's most famous frameworks, Bootstrap and Tailwind. Learn how to use the documentation, text formatting, Carousel, Cards, Buttons, Components, Animations, Accordions etc.

name: Introduction to JavaScript and Problem Solving
details: Get introduced to javascript as a programming language. Learn the basic programming fundamentals like Variables, Conditionals, Loops, Arrays, Objects, Basic Problems etc

name: JavaScript Framework : React.JS
details: Get introduced to the most famous and widely used framework of JavaScript, React.JS. Learn more about this component based framework, also hooks, APIs, Context, State, React Bootstrap, React Tailwind etc
